definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
woman who looks after small children/(old) female tutor

sentences.english: OXOM and ASSAM thoroughly one more time.
The Assamese variety can grow 18 meters high and lives about 40 years.
sentences.chinese: 阿薩姆的品種能長到18公尺高並存活約40年。

sentences.english: Assam is the home of the largest concentration Asiatic elephants in the world.
sentences.chinese: 阿薩姆邦是世界上最大的亞洲象聚居地。

sentences.english: English Breakfast tea is my favourite, Assam tea.
sentences.chinese: 英式早茶是我的最愛，阿薩姆紅茶。

sentences.english: Assem Abdel Maged says outward demeanor could be misleading.
sentences.chinese: 阿薩姆說，外在的行爲可能使人誤解。
